```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(dygraphs)
library(quantmod)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)

users <- read.table("pre-campanha/users_report.csv", sep=",")
#wide_data <- reshape(data, timevar="V2", idvar=c("V1"), direction="wide")
users$time <- (users$V1 - users$V1[1]) / 60
teste <- unclass(as.POSIXlt(as.numeric(as.character(users$V1)),origin="1970-01-01"))#, tz="GMT"
users$format_time <- paste(paste(teste$hour, teste$min, sep = ":"), teste$mday, sep = " ")
users$unformatted_time <- as.POSIXlt(as.numeric(as.character(users$V1)),origin="1970-01-01")#,tz="GMT"
users <- rename(users, Type = V2)

groups <- read.table("pre-campanha/groups_report.csv", sep=",")
#wide_data <- reshape(data, timevar="V2", idvar=c("V1"), direction="wide")
groups$time <- (groups$V1 - groups$V1[1]) / 60
groups <- rename(groups, Type = V2)

channels <- read.table("pre-campanha/channels_report.csv", sep=",")
#wide_data <- reshape(data, timevar="V2", idvar=c("V1"), direction="wide")
channels$time <- (channels$V1 - channels$V1[1]) / 60
channels <- rename(channels, Type = V2)
```
